title: Chicken Fried Rice
description: A quick and easy fried rice using leftover chicken.
steps: Cook the rice and let it cool.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté garlic.
Add chicken and cook through.
Add rice, soy sauce, and stir-fry.
Push to the side, scramble the egg, then mix in.
Top with chopped green onions and serve.

title: Simple Cheese Omelette
description: A classic breakfast omelette with cheese.
steps: Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
Melt butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour in eggs and let them set slightly.
Add cheese to one half of the omelette.
Fold the omelette in half and cook for another minute.
Slide onto a plate and serve immediately.

title: Pasta with Simple Tomato Sauce
description: Classic pasta with a quick homemade tomato sauce.
steps: Boil pasta according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté minced garlic.
Add chopped tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Season with salt, pepper, and fresh basil.
Toss cooked pasta with the sauce.
Serve hot with extra basil on top.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Colorful and healthy vegetable stir fry.
steps: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a wok or large pan.
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add harder vegetables like carrots first, cook for 2 minutes.
Add remaining vegetables and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes.
Add soy sauce, toss well, and serve immediately.

title: Classic Grilled Cheese Sandwich
steps: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place cheese between the unbuttered sides.
Heat a pan over medium heat.
Cook the sandwich buttered-side down until golden.
Flip and cook the other side until cheese melts.
Cut and serve warm.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Fresh Caesar salad with grilled chicken.
steps: Season and grill chicken breast until cooked through.
Let chicken rest, then slice into strips.
Wash and chop romaine lettuce.
Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Top with sliced chicken, parmesan, and croutons.
Squeeze fresh lemon over the top and serve.

title: Simple Rice Bowl
description: Customizable rice bowl with vegetables and protein.
steps: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Fry an egg to your liking.
Slice carrot and cucumber into thin strips.
Place rice in a bowl.
Top with fried egg, vegetables, and green onions.
Drizzle with soy sauce and sesame oil.

title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
description: Simple Italian pasta with garlic and olive oil.
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Heat olive oil in a large pan.
Add sliced garlic and red pepper flakes, cook until fragrant.
Add cooked pasta to the pan with some pasta water.
Toss everything together.
Serve with parsley and parmesan cheese.

title: Easy Beef Tacos
description: Quick and flavorful beef tacos for dinner.
steps: Brown ground beef in a pan over medium-high heat.
Add taco seasoning and a splash of water, simmer.
Warm taco shells according to package instructions.
Chop lettuce, tomato, and onion.
Fill taco shells with beef and toppings.
Serve with sour cream and extra cheese.

title: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh mozzarella and tomato salad with basil.
steps: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into rounds.
Arrange alternating slices on a plate.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately or chill for 15 minutes.

title: Hearty Vegetable Soup
steps: Dice all vegetables into small pieces.
Heat olive oil in a large pot and sauté onion and garlic.
Add carrots, celery, and potato, cook for 5 minutes.
Add tomatoes and vegetable broth.
Bring to a boil, then simmer for 25 minutes.
Season with herbs, salt, and pepper before serving.

title: Fluffy Pancakes
description: Classic breakfast pancakes that everyone loves.
steps: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
In another bowl, whisk egg, milk, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
Heat a griddle or pan over medium heat.
Pour batter and cook until bubbles form, then flip.
Serve warm with syrup and butter.

title: Fresh Greek Salad
description: Classic Greek salad with feta and olives.
steps: Chop cucumber, tomato, and red onion into chunks.
Add to a large bowl with olives.
Crumble feta cheese on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and fresh lemon juice.
Sprinkle with dried oregano.
Toss gently and serve immediately.

title: Cheese Quesadilla
description: Crispy tortilla filled with melted cheese.
steps: Place cheese on half of a tortilla.
Fold the tortilla in half.
Melt butter in a pan over medium heat.
Cook quesadilla until golden on both sides.
Cut into wedges.
Serve with sour cream and salsa.

title: Garlic Butter Shrimp
description: Quick and flavorful shrimp in garlic butter.
steps: Peel and devein shrimp if needed.
Melt butter in a large pan over medium-high heat.
Add minced garlic and cook for 30 seconds.
Add shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes per side.
Squeeze lemon juice over shrimp.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve.
